channel.title: Snippet Section? If you support, Look here!
channel.description: Well, I notice that the Snippets thread is a bit crammed and it would be a bit more easier and organized if we had a Snippets section all together. Would be a lot more handy and it would be used A LOT, as some people are too lazy to write a full tutorial on 2 lines of code (if possible). Please vote!

item.title: Snippet Section? If you support, Look here!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Because it hasen’t been put into effect I assume.

Read full topic

So why in this world is this still open?

item.title: Snippet Section? If you support, Look here!
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:31, topic:418656”]Why do you want a section for your snippets instead of a pastebin that allows comments? I understand the comments part, and if the pastebin didn’t have that I’d probably support this, but what’s your other reasoning?[/quote]That will be more useful and its sick to just browse the thread for the links…If new topic is made its much easier to search through search engines and search bar and the snippet gets more popular and i believe less people makes new threads about how to do that and where to get that. If tutorial is “snippet” then mod’s can move it to snippets board and all will be fine. Also beginners understand snippets better then actually some tutorials so i think it is needed imo.

Read full topic
item.source: Snippet Section? If you support, Look here!

Read full topic

item.title: Snippet Section? If you support, Look here!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:79, topic:418656”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=521201.msg3794477#msg3794477 date=1319516016]

We should like require approval or whatever like before.

Lol, it wont change they’ll just keep posting in tut section thinking its tut worthy even though its something like changing an ip.

it’s better to have a section for snippets then look at tuts and constantly say snippet.

But whats the use of it if they keep posting in the tut section?

And you know they will
[/quote]

yeah but then we’ll have a section to move it to.[/quote]
And approval from a mod b4 posting in the section :o

Read full topic
